title: 开不到游戏
author: dww123123
txt_content:
我的电脑是Windows7专业版64位，我有下载Java，但玩到
开启时显示
Not JVM could be found on your system.
Please defineEXE4J_JAVA_HOME
to point to installed 32-bit JDK or download a JRE from www.java.com.

replies.author: powerho3
replies.txt_content:
下载 32-BIT的Java (应该是这样)

你在哪里下载MC?
